mapper.select: /* file : BoardMapper.xml, id : getBoard */ SELECT A.* , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT , B.USERNAME AS REG_USERNAME FROM ST_BOARD A INNER JOIN ST_USER B ON A.REG_USER_SEQ = B.USER_SEQ WHERE A.DEL_FLAG = 0 AND A.BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq}

/* file : BoardMapper.xml, id : getPopNoticeBoard */ SELECT * FROM ST_BOARD WHERE del_flag = 0 AND notice_flag = 1 AND popup_flag = 1 AND BOARD_TYPE = 'notice'
AND from_dt <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND to_dt >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d')
